Articles.Content:
Most Americans may see this is a challenge.  I see something healthy in having more, global aerospace development.  With the consolidation and collapse of British civil and military aerospace production stopped and research seriously slowed.  In the US, we develop a few new, high profile systems but industrial consolidation has seen us really slow down our research and development for decades.  

Now, with private investment in space exploitation we see a resurgence in development.  China expanding her aerospace capabilities may cause more investment in American R and D.  

http://www.upi.com/Top_News/World-News/2016/12/27/China-unveils-plan-to-become-a-Top-3-aerospace-power-by-2030/8091482852862/

 

Edited December 28, 2016 by Jonfliesgoats
